PreparerFirmName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: T M Byxbee Co CPAs NY PC

IRS990.Desc: PERFORMANCE-BASED ACCOMPLISHMENTS: ANNUALLY APPROXIMATELY 30 PUBLIC PERFORMANCES ARE HELD COLLECTIVELY BY ESYO'S ENSEMBLES. CONCERTS HELD IN A VARIETY OF VENUES IN NY'S CAPITAL REGION. SOME CONCERTS REQUIRED PAID ADMISSION; MANY WERE FREE. TOTAL MUSICIANS IN ALL ENSEMBLES WAS OVER 500; MUSICIANS HAD TO AUDITION FOR MEMBERSHIP. MEMBERSHIP INCLUDES STUDENTS FROM GRADES 1-12.OBJECTIVE: TO PROVIDE PERFORMANCE OPPORTUNITIES AS A VITAL COMPONENT.MUSIC-TRAINING ACCOMPLISHMENT: EXPANDED MUSIC-TRAINING PROGRAM: CHIME, PROVIDED FREE, DAILY MUSIC INSTRUCTION FOR ECONOMICALLY CHALLENGED ELEMENTARY STUDENT IN SCHENECTADY AND TROY AND FREE, WEEKLY PRIVATE LESSONS FOR ECONOMICALLY CHALLENGED MIDDLE SCHOOL CHILDREN IN ALBANY AND SCHENECTADY. MASTER CLASSES AND RESIDENCIES WERE OFFERED. MIDDLE SCHOOL STUDENTS PARTICIPATED IN A PILOT NON-AUDITION BASED WIND AND BRASS CHAMBER PROGRAM.OBJECTIVE: TO ENSURE THE MUSICIANS OF TOMORROW ARE AS DIVERSE AS THE COMMUNITIES THEY SEEK TO INSPIRE.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Part V, Line 4: Intended uses of the endowment fund.
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION RECEIVED A RESTRICTED GIFT OF AN ENDOWMENT FUND WHICH WAS FUNDED IN PRIOR YEARS. THE INVESTMENT EARNINGS MAY BE WITHDRAWN AND USED FOR GENERAL OPERATING PURPOSES.

UNDER THE PROVISIONS OF FASB ASC TOPIC RELATED TO UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS, THE ORGANIZATION BELIEVES IT HAS APPROPRIATE SUPPORT FOR ANY TAX POSITIONS TAKEN, AND AS SUCH, DOES NOT HAVE ANY UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS THAT ARE MATERIAL TO THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Line 11b: Form 990 Review Process
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE AUDIT AND COMPLIANCE COMMITTEE ALONG WITH THE FINANCE COMMITTEE CHAIR REVIEWS AND APPROVES THE 990 PRIOR TO FILING AS DESIGNATED BY THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS. THE ORGANIZATION THEN MAKES THE 990 AVAILABLE AT THE NEXT BOARD MEETING AFTER IT HAS BEEN COMPLETED OR UPON REQUEST BY ANY BOARD MEMBER.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Line 12c: Explanation of Monitoring and Enforcement of Conflicts
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: CERTAIN MEMBERS OF THE BOARD HAVE DISCLOSED OUTSIDE BUSINESS RELATIONSHIPS WHICH HAVE NO BEARING ON THEIR ABILITY TO SERVE ON THE BOARD OR CREATE A CONFLICT OF INTEREST.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Line 15a: Compensation Review & Approval Process - CEO, Top Management
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS APPROVES COMPENSATION OF THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR. IN ADDITION, THE BOARD APPROVES THE ANNUAL BUDGET THAT INCLUDES A LINE ITEM FOR COMPENSATION OF ALL EMPLOYEES WITH MODEST INCREASES IN COMPENSATION, IF ANY.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Line 19: Other Organization Documents Publicly Available
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THESE ITEMS ARE MADE AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC UPON WRITTEN REQUEST FOR AN APPOINTMENT.
